notes.title: Important Update Coming Soon
notes.message: We're excited to announce that a major update is coming soon with new features! Check the Play Store for updates in the next few days.

notes.title: Service Maintenance
notes.message: Our service will be undergoing maintenance on May 25th. The app might experience temporary disruptions during this period. Thank you for your patience.

notes.title: Discount Sale Alert
notes.message: Don't miss our partner's summer sale! Use code CLOTHING25 for 25% off. Visit their website to learn more.
